_config:table.definition: CREATE TABLE TI_DPGROUP_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# (CATENTRY_ID BIGINT NOT NULL, CATGROUP VARCHAR(4000), PRIMARY KEY (CATENTRY_ID))
_config:table.name: TI_DPGROUP_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#

_config:query.sql: SELECT DISTINCT CATGPENREL.CATENTRY_ID CATENTRY_ID, rtrim(cast(catgpenrel.catalog_id as char(23))) ||'_'|| rtrim(cast(CATGPENREL.CATGROUP_ID as char(23))) CATGROUP_ID FROM CATGPENREL, TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# CE, TI_CGPUB_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# CD WHERE CATGPENREL.CATENTRY_ID=CE.CATENTRY_ID AND CATGPENREL.CATGROUP_ID = CD.CATGROUP_ID AND CD.PUBLISHED IN (?unpublished?, ?published?) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CATENTREL WHERE CATENTRY_ID_CHILD=CE.CATENTRY_ID AND CATRELTYPE_ID ='PRODUCT_ITEM') ORDER BY CATENTRY_ID

_config:table.definition: CREATE TABLE TI_DPGROUPI_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# (CATENTRY_ID BIGINT NOT NULL, CATGROUP VARCHAR(4000), PRIMARY KEY (CATENTRY_ID))
_config:table.name: TI_DPGROUPI_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#

_config:query.sql: SELECT X.CATENTRY_ID_CHILD CATENTRY_ID, CG.CATGROUP CATGROUP_ID FROM TI_DPGROUP_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# CG, (SELECT CATENTRY_ID_PARENT,CATENTRY_ID_CHILD FROM TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#,CATENTREL WHERE CATENTRY_ID_CHILD=CATENTRY_ID AND CATENTTYPE_ID='ItemBean' AND CATRELTYPE_ID='PRODUCT_ITEM') X WHERE CG.CATENTRY_ID=X.CATENTRY_ID_PARENT ORDER BY CATENTRY_ID

_config:table.definition: CREATE TABLE TI_DPGRPID_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#_#lang_tag# (CATGROUP_ID BIGINT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (CATGROUP_ID))
_config:table.name: TI_DPGRPID_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#_#lang_tag#

_config:query.sql: SELECT DISTINCT CATGPENREL.CATGROUP_ID from CATGPENREL, TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# CE, TI_CGPUB_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# CD WHERE CATGPENREL.CATENTRY_ID=CE.CATENTRY_ID AND CATGPENREL.CATGROUP_ID = CD.CATGROUP_ID AND CD.PUBLISHED IN (?unpublished?, ?published?)

_config:table.definition: CREATE TABLE TI_GRPNAME_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#_#lang_tag# (CATGROUP_ID BIGINT NOT NULL, CATGRPNAME VARCHAR(1024), PRIMARY KEY (CATGROUP_ID))
_config:table.name: TI_GRPNAME_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#_#lang_tag#

_config:query.sql: SELECT CG.CATGROUP_ID, CD.NAME FROM CATGRPDESC CD, TI_DPGRPID_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#_#lang_tag# CG WHERE CG.CATGROUP_ID=CD.CATGROUP_ID AND CD.LANGUAGE_ID IN (?language_id?) AND CD.PUBLISHED IN (?unpublished?, ?published?) UNION SELECT CATGRPREL.CATGROUP_ID_CHILD CATGROUP_ID, CD.NAME FROM CATGRPDESC CD, CATGRPREL, TI_DPGRPID_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#_#lang_tag# CG WHERE CG.CATGROUP_ID=CATGRPREL.CATGROUP_ID_CHILD AND CATGRPREL.CATGROUP_ID_PARENT=CD.CATGROUP_ID AND CD.LANGUAGE_ID IN (?language_id?) AND CD.PUBLISHED IN (?unpublished?, ?published?) ORDER BY CATGROUP_ID

_config:table.definition: CREATE TABLE TI_DPGRPNAME_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#_#lang_tag# (CATENTRY_ID BIGINT NOT NULL, CATGRPNAME CLOB, PRIMARY KEY (CATENTRY_ID))
_config:table.name: TI_DPGRPNAME_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#_#lang_tag#

_config:query.sql: (SELECT CATGPENREL.CATENTRY_ID, CGDESC.CATGRPNAME FROM CATGPENREL, TI_GRPNAME_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#_#lang_tag# CGDESC, TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# CE WHERE CATGPENREL.CATENTRY_ID=CE.CATENTRY_ID AND CATGPENREL.CATGROUP_ID=CGDESC.CATGROUP_ID AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CATENTREL WHERE CATENTRY_ID_CHILD=CE.CATENTRY_ID AND CATRELTYPE_ID ='PRODUCT_ITEM')) UNION( SELECT X.CATENTRY_ID_CHILD CATENTRY_ID, CGDESC.CATGRPNAME FROM CATGPENREL, TI_GRPNAME_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#_#lang_tag# CGDESC, (SELECT CATENTRY_ID_PARENT,CATENTRY_ID_CHILD FROM TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#,CATENTREL WHERE CATENTRY_ID_CHILD=CATENTRY_ID AND CATENTTYPE_ID='ItemBean' AND CATRELTYPE_ID='PRODUCT_ITEM') X WHERE CATGPENREL.CATGROUP_ID = CGDESC.CATGROUP_ID AND CATGPENREL.CATENTRY_ID=X.CATENTRY_ID_PARENT) ORDER BY CATENTRY_ID
